name: Developers table (last year)

entity.name: author
entity.filter: not name starts with _ and has changes during last year

conditional.query: date of first commit during last year
date of first commit not during last 3 years

columns.label: % Volume of change
columns.query: (sum churn of changes) / (sum churn of project's changes)

conditional.query: (sum churn of changes) / (sum churn of project's changes) <  0.01
(sum churn of changes) / (sum churn of project's changes) >  0.1

columns.label: Growth
columns.query: sum growth of changes having growth > 0

columns.label: Volume of change (last year)
columns.query: sum churn of commits having (date during last year)

columns.label: % Volume of change (last year)
columns.query: (sum churn of commits having (date during last year)) / (sum churn of project's commits having (date during last year))

conditional.query: (sum churn of commits having (date during last year)) / (sum churn of project's commits having (date during last year)) <  0.01
(sum churn of commits having (date during last year)) / (sum churn of project's commits having (date during last year)) >  0.1

columns.label: Volume of change (last year, organic)
columns.query: sum churn of commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import)

columns.label: % Volume of change (last year, organic)
columns.query: (sum churn of commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import)) / (sum churn of project's commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import))

conditional.query: (sum churn of commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import)) / (sum churn of project's commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import)) <  0.01

(sum churn of commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import)) / (sum churn of project's commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import)) >  0.1

columns.label: Volume of change (last year, source-code)
columns.query: sum churn of changes since last year for files having technology.code

columns.label: % Volume of change (last year, source-code)
columns.query: (sum churn of changes since last year for files having technology.code) / (sum churn of project's changes since last year for project's files having technology.code)

conditional.query: (sum churn of changes since last year for files having technology.code) / (sum churn of project's changes since last year for project's files having technology.code) <  0.01
(sum churn of changes since last year for files having technology.code) / (sum churn of project's changes since last year for project's files having technology.code) >  0.1

columns.label: Volume of change (last year, organic, source-code)
columns.query: sum churn of commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import) for files having technology.code

columns.label: % Volume of change (last year, organic, source-code)
columns.query: (sum churn of commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import) for files having technology.code) / (sum churn of project's commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import) for project's files having technology.code)

conditional.query: (sum churn of commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import) for files having technology.code) / (sum churn of project's commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import) for project's files having technology.code) <  0.01

(sum churn of commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import) for files having technology.code) / (sum churn of project's commits having (date during last year and not volume.*.bulk and not volume.*.import) for project's files having technology.code) >  0.1

columns.label: Growth (last year, source-code)
columns.query: sum growth of changes having (date since last year and growth > 0) for files having technology.code

columns.label: % Growth (last year, source-code)
columns.query: (sum growth of changes having (date since last year and growth > 0) for files having technology.code) / (sum growth of project's changes having (date since last year and growth > 0) for project's files having technology.code)

conditional.query: (sum growth of changes having (date since last year and growth > 0) for files having technology.code) / (sum growth of project's changes having (date since last year and growth > 0) for project's files having technology.code) <  0.01

(sum growth of changes having (date since last year and growth > 0) for files having technology.code) / (sum growth of project's changes having (date since last year and growth > 0) for project's files having technology.code) >  0.1

columns.label: Last Year Files
columns.query: count files for changes having date since last year

notes: This table contains many columns (all changes/organic/source-code). Not all are useful, so remove the ones that are not. Also, remove the status.active filter if you want to see data about all developers.
